NAME: A Bard´s Beloved
COMMENT: Talk to Bard in cave east of Palisade

NAME: A Costly Mistake
COMMENT: West of Hangman's Alley

NAME: A Dangerous Game
COMMENT: make sure to collect the green statuette during this quest or you will not be able to complete "The Soldier Statuette

NAME: A dark legacy
COMMENT: Buy eagle statue and go to armorer to dismantle it

NAME: A Deadly Plot
COMMENT: You must accept Dijkstra's offer at the end of "Now or Never" to be able to start this quest

NAME: A Dog´s Life
COMMENT: Follow the road that is east of Oreton. Eventually you will reach a pack of wolves attacking a stray dog

NAME: A Favor for a Friend
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: A feast for crows
COMMENT: Should appear somewhat late in game - Start at Chameleon and when back to door run straight forward (acros dry river)

NAME: A Final Kindness
COMMENT: If Geralt allowed Keira to leave to bargin with Radovid during For the Advancement of Learning, or does not attempt to finish all of Keira's quests this Quest is triggered after a Bald Mountain and talking to Triss.

NAME: A Frying Pan, Spick and Span
A Greedy God
COMMENT: South of a Wastrel Manor

NAME: A Matter of Life and Death
COMMENT: The quest starts where Triss holds shelter

NAME: A Plea Ignored
COMMENT: South of Condyle

NAME: A Portrait of the Witcher as an Old Man
COMMENT: South of The Gran Palace on the south side of the market square

NAME: A surprise inheritance
COMMENT: North of Heddel

NAME: A Tome Entombed
COMMENT: Open your World Map and draw a mental line between the signposts for Heirarch Square and the Oxenfurt Gate. There’s an entrance (big one) to the sewers just about on the halfway point.

NAME: A Towerful of Mice
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: Amidst the Mill's Grist
COMMENT: This Unlocks after you took the ritual to know what Dettlaff was doing before he lost his hand. Visit the mill before going to the boot.

NAME: An Eye for an Eye
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: An Invitation from Keira Metz
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: An Unfortunate Turn of Events
COMMENT: questionmark south of Devil's Pit

NAME: An Unpaid Debt
TRIGGER: Quest: Stranger in a Strange Land
COMMENT: This quest is available if you’ve completed the Stranger in a Strange Land secondary quest and used Simun to escape from the prison.

NAME: Applied Escapology
COMMENT: Questionmark north west of Toussaint Prison

NAME: Armed Assault
COMMENT: Approach the cottage on the southeast outskirts of Rannvaig

NAME: Around the World in... Eight Days
COMMENT: Questionmark east of Coronata Vineyard

NAME: Battlefield Loot
COMMENT: North-West of White Eagle Fort

NAME: Be It Ever So Humble
TRIGGER: Quest: Pomp and strange circumstance / Quest: Burlap is the New Strip

NAME: Berengar's blade
COMMENT: As soon as you get to Kaer Morhen search the lower area near the main gate for a crate

NAME: Beyond Hill and Dale (branch 1)
TRIGGER: Quest: The night of the Long Fangs
COMMENT: Only available in story branch 1

NAME: Big Feet To Fill: The 1st Group
COMMENT: North east of Fox Hollow

NAME: Big Feet To Fill: The 2nd Group
COMMENT: South West of plegmund's bridge

NAME: Big Feet To Fill: The 3th Group
COMMENT: North of Castel Ravello Vineyard at the right bridge with a pack of wolves.

NAME: Big Feet To Fill: The 4th Group
COMMENT: East of The Silver Salamander Inn

NAME: Big Feet To Fill: The 5th Group
COMMENT: North of Prophet Lebioda Statue

NAME: Bitter Harvest
COMMENT: North-West of Hanged Man's Tree

NAME: Black Pearl
COMMENT: Right outside the Golden Sturgeon in Harborside is a man named Nidas

NAME: Blood Gold
COMMENT: North-West of White Eagle Fort

NAME: Blood Simple (branch 1 & 2)
TRIGGER: Quest: The night of the Long Fangs
COMMENT: Optional in story branch 1. Mandatory for story branch 2.

NAME: Brave Fools Die Young
COMMENT: Follow the road out of Fyresdal to the north, and you'll come across a large, flaming monument.

NAME: Broken Flowers
COMMENT: go to inn to meet Dandelion after "Novigrad Dreaming" quest.

NAME: Burlap is the New Stripe
COMMENT: If you did not return Syanna’s ribbon in Beyond Hill and Dale

NAME: But Other Than That, How Did You Enjoy the Play?
Cabaret
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists - talk to Dandelion after "A Poet Under Pressure" quest

NAME: Carnal Sins
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: Ciri´s Room
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: Ciri´s Story: Out of the Shadows
Ciri´s Story: The King of the Wolves
Coast of Wrecks
COMMENT: Island group west of Ursten

NAME: Coin Doesn't Stink
COMMENT: Questionmark north-west bridge from Dun Tynne Crossroads

NAME: Contract: Deadly Delights
COMMENT: Notice board at the docks

NAME: Contract: Equine Phantoms
COMMENT: Exclamation mark on a road leading north east from Dun Tynne Crossroads.

NAME: Contract: Feet as Cold as Ice
COMMENT: You can also find Francois sleeping close to Grottore’s Cave North West of Beauclair Palace

NAME: Contract: Missing Son
COMMENT: Talk to man on crossroads

NAME: Contract: Phantom of the Trade Route
Contract: Strange Beast
COMMENT: In Prima Guide it's called 'Contract: Waylaid Transport'

NAME: Contract: The Beast of Honorton
COMMENT: DLC - initially listed as a witcher contract (The Beast of Honorton), then transforms into a side quest (Where the Cat and Wolf Play...)

NAME: Contract: The Creature from Oxenfurt Forest
Contract: The Griffin from the Highlands
COMMENT: In Prima Guide it's called 'Contract: Components for an Armorer'

NAME: Contract: The Mystery of the Byways Murders
Contract: The Phantom of Eldberg
TRIGGER: Quest: The King Is Dead - Long Live the King

NAME: Coronation
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: Count Reuven´s Treasure
COMMENT: available after quest "Broken Flowers". Talk to Sigi Reuven in the Bathhouse

NAME: Crime and Punishment
COMMENT: Sail the coast to the east, be sure to visit Rogne afterwards

NAME: Death by Fire
COMMENT: West of Codgers' Quarry

NAME: Deserter gold
COMMENT: Find the spy's notes by the corpse

NAME: Dirty Funds
COMMENT: Notes in the crate in the campsite that are guarded by wolves

NAME: Disturbance
COMMENT: Tied in to Ugly Baby

NAME: Don´t Play with the Gods
COMMENT: South-east of Duen Hen

NAME: Don't Take Candy from a Stranger
COMMENT: Questionmark south-west of Prophet Lebioda Statue

NAME: Dowry
COMMENT: questionmark north of White Eagle Fort

NAME: Duck, Duck, Goosed!
COMMENT: Notice Board in the small cluster of buildings where the flint girl is during the main story quest Beyond Hill and Dale.

NAME: Empty Coop
COMMENT: east of Honeyfill Meadworks

NAME: Enchanting: Quality Has Its Price
COMMENT: At the end of the quest you can pay 10000 and even 15000 more, but it's not needed for this quest!!

NAME: Event : A Man's Best Friend (an aggressive dog before a hut)
COMMENT: North-west of Hanged Man's Tree close to some remote farm

NAME: Event : Crow's perch fight
COMMENT: Appears after Baron quests, argument left after the bridge

NAME: Event : Strumpet In Distress (Couple by the docks)
COMMENT: Argument behind first house on the docks

NAME: Event : Woe is Me (Palisade ambush)
COMMENT: Talk to peasant near the travel sign

NAME: Event: A Warm Welcome (Passing to Novigrad)
COMMENT: south west of Wheat Fields

NAME: Event: At the mercy of strangers (soldier bound and attacked by drowners)
COMMENT: Go west from Mulbrydale, towards the river and the Marauder’s Bridge. You’ll hear screaming – follow it and learn the tale of John Verdun.

NAME: Event: Call of the Wild (Werewolf Fight)
COMMENT: east from Arinbjorn where the sounds of the forest to your right (south) indicate a pack of wolves

NAME: Event: Caravan Attack
COMMENT: You’ll find the caravan by going to the Marauder’s Bridge, then heading west.

NAME: Event: Contract on a witcher
COMMENT: Event triggers after the quest 'Wine is Sacred'

NAME: Event: Deadly crossing I
COMMENT: Bandits asking tole on troll bridge

NAME: Event: Deadly Crossing II - Mulbrydale
COMMENT: Bandits asking toll on Bridge North of Lindenvale - Return later to recieve the 'Mourner steel sword'

NAME: Event: Deadly Crossing III - Crookback Bog
COMMENT: West of the Dragonslayer’s Grotto, in the forest and next to a wooden log bridge over a ravine

NAME: Event: Drunken Rabble
COMMENT: Close to or when exiting the Golden Sturgeon

NAME: Event: Face Me if You Dare! I
COMMENT: Ronvid the Idiot challenges you to fight

NAME: Event: Face Me if You Dare! II
COMMENT: He's standing near the boat south-east of Novigrad

NAME: Event: Face Me if You Dare! III
COMMENT: He's standing west of Hierarch Square

NAME: Event: Farting Trolls
COMMENT: Southeast of Wild Shore

NAME: Event: Grave Robbers 'visiting grandpa'
COMMENT: This is part of 'Till Death Do You Part' if you choose to relocate the male. If you choose to relocate the female you can still trigger this event.

NAME: Event: Harassing A Troll
COMMENT: North-West of the Inn at the crossroads close to the river banks

NAME: Event: Highway Robbery
COMMENT: If you walk down a forested path leading from the Boatmaker’s Hut to the southwest, you may come across a trader who is being attacked by three bandits.

NAME: Event: Highwayman's Cache / Deadly Crossings IV (Bridge toll at Boatmakers' Hut)
COMMENT: East of Boatmakers Hut

NAME: Event: Karmic Justice (Elven vs Humans about fisstech x2)
COMMENT: Can be started by traveling at night between Southern and Tretogor Gates. 2x exclamation mark!

NAME: Event: Looters (I) - Revolting Peasants
COMMENT: Woodland Gang: The wooded path east of Heatherton, and northeast of the Wolven Glade. Expect five infantry, and three horsemen.

NAME: Event: Looters (II) - Ghoulish Gatherers
COMMENT: Find them at the inactive Codger’s Quarry, where an initially gruff chat turns into a pleading for help.

NAME: Event: Looters (III) - Toderas Bandits
COMMENT: Find them at the village of Toderas, where a brief conversation degenerates into mindless violence

NAME: Event: Naughty Feathers (Vivienne and Guillaume Romance)
COMMENT: This unlocks after you finished the DLC Blood & Wine

NAME: Event: Never Trust Children
COMMENT: Outside the Crooked House (Triss’ hideout) in The Bits, northeast of Hierarch Square

NAME: Event: Never Trust Children II - Skellige
COMMENT: you come upon by threading the path from Sund to Arinbjorn

NAME: Event: Pest Man Wish (Sequel to Hazarious Goods)
COMMENT: East of Reardon Manor wandering around a remote house

NAME: Event: Racists of Novigrad (I) - Female Elf
COMMENT: North of Portside Gate, at the junction close to a stall

NAME: Event: Racists of Novigrad (II) - Male Elf
COMMENT: Southeast of Tretogor Gate

NAME: Event: Saving Moritz Diefenthal from the pyre
COMMENT: Rescue him when he's burning at the stake outside the city walls post-evacuation

NAME: Event: Siren’s Call (shepherd vs Sirens)
COMMENT: east from Arinbjorn

NAME: Event: Strangers in the night (Merchant vs Nilfgaardian Soldier)
COMMENT: West from Carsten

NAME: Event: Suspicious Shakedown (trio of bandits and a nervous merchant)
COMMENT: south of the Gate of the Hierarch and quite close to the canal

NAME: Event: The Flame Of Hatred (discussion with a preacher)
COMMENT: East of Hierarch Square a preacher starts insulting you

NAME: Event: The Four Faces of Hemdall (three pirates and a pilgrim)
COMMENT: Northwest of Trottheim

NAME: Event: The Most Truest of Basilisks (beast tamer)
COMMENT: Travel Northeast of Oxenfurt Harbor near the bridge. There you will see a guy entertaining a group of guards with a caged Basilisks.

NAME: Event: The Price Of Passage (War Tax)
COMMENT: When traveling near Oxenfurt, you will be approached by two Redanian soldiers asking for a "war tax".

NAME: Event: Trail of Echoes (Witcher Cave)
COMMENT: Follow the wooded path leading northwest from Kaer Morhen almost due north of the Bastion signpost. You uncover a cave where a wolf head greets you.

NAME: Event: Witch Hunter Raids
COMMENT: Secondary quest you can happen upon in the Farcorners slums at the house of Remi Villeroy and Louisa Villeroy

NAME: Event: Yustianna Disturbed
COMMENT: You need the Eye of Nehaleni if you want to loot it without the bandits to notice

NAME: Evil's Soft First Touches
COMMENT: If you had the expansions installed when starting a new game this quest shows up when arriving in Velen.

NAME: Extreme Cosplay
COMMENT: Exclamation mark between Mere-Lachaislongue Cemetery and Trestamara Hunting Lodge and near the big farm south west of Gelenser Farm

NAME: Faithful Friend
COMMENT: Only available during the epilogue of the Main Quest: Something Ends, Something Begins - Emperess Ending Only

NAME: Fake Papers
COMMENT: Do not complete before "Thou Shalt Not Pass

NAME: Fencing Lessons
COMMENT: you must accept Rosa's lesson offer during "Broken Flowers" main quest

NAME: Finders keepers
COMMENT: Search the chest in the wreck after getting rid off pirates

NAME: Fists of Fury: Champion of Champions
Flesh for sale
COMMENT: Complete before starting "Following the Thread

NAME: Following the Thread
COMMENT: Do not start this at all before completing "Flesh for Sale

NAME: For Fame and Glory
COMMENT: West, just outside Larvik

NAME: For the Advancement of Learning
TRIGGER: Quest: A Favor for a Friend
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: Forefathers´ Eve
COMMENT: Meet with the Pellar in his house after completing the "A Towerful of Mice" or during Family Matters he'll come to Crow's Perch to ask you to help him during a cutscene.

NAME: Free Spirit
COMMENT: On the coast of big island right before the Ancient Crypt signpost

NAME: Freya Be Praised!
COMMENT: Eastside of the lake right under Blandare

NAME: From a land far, far away
COMMENT: East of Redgill there is a small island that the locals call Hemdall’s Finger

NAME: Funeral Pyres
COMMENT: West of Mulbrydale, you'll pass this woman next to a shrine you pass during the Velen Races.

NAME: Gangs of Novigrad
COMMENT: Directly connected with main quest, but can still be failed - Meet Cleaver west of Hierarch Square after "Get Junior" quest is triggered

NAME: Get Junior
COMMENT: available after quest "Broken Flowers". Talk to Sigi Reuven in the Bathhouse

NAME: Ghosts of the Past
TRIGGER: Quest: The Fall of the House of Reardon
COMMENT: you must simulate Witcher 2 choices and tell Voorhis that you spared Letho, and then you must complete it before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: Goodness Gracious Great Balls of Granite
Greenhouse effect
COMMENT: From the Iron Mine fasttravel point head south following the path, cross the water, past the cave. The Greenhouse is at the end of the (sometimes not so clearly) path.

NAME: Gwent: Big City Players
COMMENT: Notice board near the docks - Do not play with Serenity before unlocking Dijkstra, and complete it while he's available

NAME: Gwent: Old Pals
COMMENT: Best to start this quest by Playing Zoltan

NAME: Gwent: Playing Innkeeps
COMMENT: Start with Innkeeper Stjepan in The Alchemy Inn, Oxenfurt / Spoiler : Complete before Olivier dies in "Now or Never" if you want to avoid a failed objective

NAME: Gwent: Playing Thaler
COMMENT: After you help Thaler with the trolls during the quest A Deadly Plot, you will be able to talk to him. If you do not talk to him in here, you can find him in the Seven Cats Inn.

NAME: Gwent: Skellige Style
COMMENT: You need to have completed Gwent in velen and at least started the Gwent big city players(not need to complete) to have it appear / Spoiler: Make sure to play with Lugos while he's available of you will get a failed objective

NAME: Gwent: To Everything – Turn, Turn, Tournament
Gwent: Velen Players
COMMENT: Spoiler : Complete before Baron storyline ends in "Return to Crookback Bog" or, if you ignore it, before going to the Isle of Mists if you want to avoid a failed objective

NAME: Haunted house
COMMENT: Sometime after you complete the Act One: Novigrad quest Novigrad Dreaming you’ll find a message on a noticeboard about a haunted house

NAME: Hey, You Wanna Look at my Stuff?
COMMENT: You begin by talking to a halfling merchant south-west of St. Gregory's Bridge near the docks

NAME: Hidden from the World
COMMENT: Across the water, southeast from the Ferry Station signpost,

NAME: Hidden in the Depths
COMMENT: Questionmark south west of Haviken (Should appear somewhat late in game) - Be aware that the quest auto complete's, you have to dive into the cave to find the loot

NAME: Hidden Messages of the Nilfgaardian Kind
COMMENT: Northeast of the Kingfisher Inn there you will see two shady individuals fussing about a particular patch of land close to a wooden deck.

NAME: High Stakes
COMMENT: To start this quest you’ll need to find the notice at the notice board near the St.-Gregor’s-Bridge in Novigard, mentioning the Gwent tournament / Spoiler: You will get a failed objective once some of them are no longer available, so play with them soon enough.

NAME: Honor Among Thieves
COMMENT: you must let Rico go during "Get Junior" main quest to trigger this, talk to the Beggar King afterwards

NAME: In the Heart of the Woods
Iron Maiden
COMMENT: East of Harviken

NAME: Ironsides´ Treasure
COMMENT: questionmark on biggest Island north of Faroe Isle (Harviken), south east of Grotto, south east of the main Skellige island

NAME: It Takes Three to Tango
COMMENT: If you romanced Triss and Yenefer

NAME: Kaer Morhen
COMMENT: first mission after intro scenes: geralt's dream of young ciri

NAME: King´s Gambit
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: La Cage au Fou
COMMENT: Option to earn "There Can Only Be One" - Thoroughly explore the WIght's Lair and when hiding in the closet try to lift the curse instead of attacking.

NAME: Last rites
COMMENT: north of blackbough - only avaiable at night

NAME: Lilac and Gooseberries
COMMENT: first mission after ariving at white orchard

NAME: Lost Goods
COMMENT: questionmark north of Ferry Station

NAME: Love´s Cruel Snares
COMMENT: Should appear somewhat late in game - North of the abandoned village there's a second abandoned village, talk to Peasant after resettlement of that village.

NAME: Magic Lamp
COMMENT: can be missed by refusing to help Keira at the end of "Wandering in the Dark" main quest

NAME: Message from and Old Friend
COMMENT: Find the book in the bookstore

NAME: Monster Slayer
COMMENT: North-East of Lakeside Hut sign

NAME: Not Only Eagles Dare
COMMENT: Find the wreck south-east of Svorlag

NAME: Novigrad Dreaming
COMMENT: South-east of Hierarch Square

NAME: Novigrad Hospitality
COMMENT: Follow the road leading north-west

NAME: Novigrad, Closed City
COMMENT: Becomes available after "Now or Never

NAME: Novigrad, Closed city II
COMMENT: Becomes available after "Now or Never", you can trigger it south of the brothel and a tad north-northwest of Hattori's

NAME: Now or Never
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists and you should complete Gwent: Playing Innkeeps before starting this quest

NAME: Of Diary and Darkness
COMMENT: Merchant sells some quest items

NAME: Of Sheers and a Witcher I Sing
COMMENT: Exclamation Mark north West of Lebioda's Gate

NAME: On Death´s Bed
COMMENT: it's available only before unlocking Velen, so make sure to finish it before returning to Vesemir after collecting the griffin reward

NAME: Out of the Frying Pan, into the Fire
Out on Your Arse!
COMMENT: Should appear somewhat late in game - North of portside Gate in the Crippled Kate's Brothel

NAME: Paperchase
COMMENT: Exclamation mark near armorer and blacksmith in Beauclair

NAME: Peace Disturbed
COMMENT: Cave north of Crossroads travelpoint

NAME: Pearls of the Coast
COMMENT: South of Eldberg Lighthouse

NAME: Pomp and Strange Circumstances
COMMENT: If you returned Syanna’s ribbon in Beyond Hill and Dale or if you played What Lies Unseen

NAME: Possession
TRIGGER: Quest: The King Is Dead - Long Live the King
COMMENT: must be done before sailing off for the Sunstone

NAME: Practicum in Advanced Alchemy
COMMENT: Talk to Gremist outside his home

NAME: Precious Haul
COMMENT: North of Abondoned Village, on the shore

NAME: Pyres of Novigrad
COMMENT: South of Hierarch Square

NAME: Queen Zuleyka´s Treasure
COMMENT: Somewhat north of Coast of Wrecks you need to take the letter from the bed near the fireplace

NAME: Race: The Great Erasmus Vegelbud Memorial Derby
Races: Swift as the Western Winds
Reason of State
COMMENT: be careful not to beat up Dijkstra while rescuing Philippa or you will lose this quest even if you completed "A Deadly Plot

NAME: Return to the Crookback Bog
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: Rough Neighbourhood
COMMENT: Should appear somewhat late in game - use only your fists! Otherwise this quest will not be triggered

NAME: Ruins, Hidden Treasure, You Know
COMMENT: Corpse with the Quest is just east through the gate of Drove Ruins - NO QUESTION MARK!

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Bear School Gear
COMMENT: Given to you automatically once you find a related piece

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Bear School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 1
COMMENT: Ibraham Savi's First Map sold by Blacksmith in Oxenfurt

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Bear School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 2
COMMENT: Blacksmith near Bridge to Kaer Trolde

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Bear School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 3
COMMENT: Blacksmith near Bridge to Kaer Trolde

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Bear School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 4
COMMENT: Blacksmith near Bridge to Kaer Trolde

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Cat School Gear
COMMENT: In a house close by the Portside Gate sign, on the dest, you'll find a diary, which - when read - begins this quest

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Cat School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 1
COMMENT: Vendor and blacksmith in Blackbough, Velen

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Cat School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 2
COMMENT: Vendor and blacksmith in Blackbough, Velen

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Cat School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 3
COMMENT: Adalbert Kermith's Third Map sold by Crow's Perch Vendor

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Cat School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 4
COMMENT: Adalbert Kermith's Fourth Map sold by Lindenvale Vendor

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Griffin School Gear
COMMENT: Given to you automatically once you find a related piece

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Griffin School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 1
COMMENT: Edwin Greloff's First Map sold by Armourer in Midcopse

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Griffin School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 2
COMMENT: Edwin Greloff's First Map sold by Armourer in Midcopse

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Griffin School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 3
COMMENT: map sold by Armorer near Hierarch Square, Novigrad

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Griffin School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 4
COMMENT: map sold by Hattori the master blacksmith, Novigrad

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Viper School Gear
COMMENT: Letter to be found near Kolgrim's corpse in the crypt

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Wolf School Gear
COMMENT: Given to you automatically once you find a related piece

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Wolf School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 1
COMMENT: map sold by Hattori the master blacksmith, Novigrad

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Wolf School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 2
COMMENT: map sold by Blacksmith in Lindenvale

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Wolf School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 3
COMMENT: map sold by Blacksmith in Kaer Muire, The Skellige Isles

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Wolf School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 4
COMMENT: map sold by Armorer near Hierarch Square, Novigrad

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Wolf School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 5
COMMENT: map sold by Hattori the master blacksmith, Novigrad

NAME: Scavenger Hunt: Wolf School Gear Upgrade Diagrams - Part 6
COMMENT: map sold by Armorer near Bridge to Kaer Trolde, The Skellige Isles

NAME: Shock Therapy
COMMENT: Talk to one of druids

NAME: Shortcut
COMMENT: In north side of the small lake

NAME: Skjall´s Grave
TRIGGER: Quest: The Child of the Elder Blood
COMMENT: only accessible if you make a specific choice during The Child of the Elder Blood.

NAME: Spoontaneous Profits
COMMENT: Read a note attached to one of the spoons

NAME: Sunken Chest
COMMENT: South of Fyke Isle

NAME: Sunken Treasure
COMMENT: North-West of Hangman's Alley

NAME: Take What You Want
TRIGGER: Quest: Where the Cat and Wolf Play

NAME: Taken as a lass
COMMENT: West of Redgill along the shore / don't talk with Kurisu in Freya's temple on the isle of Hindarsfjall, before start this quest or quest will be complete without any other objectives

NAME: Temerian Valuables
COMMENT: West of Mill you'll find the ordes in a locked crate hidden under water

NAME: Tesham Mutna
TRIGGER: Quest: Beyond Hill and Dale / Quest: What Lies Unseen

NAME: The Bastion
COMMENT: requires a magic lamp, so you must have completed "Magic Lamp" first

NAME: The Beast of Toussaint
COMMENT: Option to earn "There Can Only Be One" - After fighting the Shalemaar in the arena decide to spare its life. (Compassion)

NAME: The Beast of White Orchard
COMMENT: If you want to experience the full mission, do NOT explore to much!

NAME: The Black Widow
COMMENT: Questionmark west of Flovive

NAME: The Cave of Dreams
TRIGGER: Quest: Stranger in a Strange Land
COMMENT: South-East of Holmstein's Port on shore

NAME: The Curse of Carnarvon
COMMENT: Questionmark east of Castel Ravello Vineyard

NAME: The cursed chapel
COMMENT: North of Upper Mill

NAME: The Dead Have No Defense
COMMENT: South of Duen Hen

NAME: The Drakenbord Redemption
COMMENT: North-East of Sarrasin Grange in entrance of Cave

NAME: The Fall of the House of Reardon
The Final Trial
COMMENT: Tied in to Ugly Baby

NAME: The Heroes´ Pursuits: Fayrlund
COMMENT: North-east of Fayrlund

NAME: The Heroes´ Pursuits: For the Goddess´ Glory!
COMMENT: Complete the other races in Skellige first

NAME: The Hunger Game
COMMENT: It triggers after a few days at Corvo Bianco after peacefully resolving a confrontation during La Cage au Fou

NAME: The Inconstant Gardener
COMMENT: Questionmark south-west of Tesham Mutna Ruins

NAME: The King is Dead - Long Live the King
The Last Exploits of Selina's Gang
COMMENT: Questionmark located at the banks of the The old cemetry

NAME: The Last Wish
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: The Lord of Undvik
TRIGGER: Quest: The King Is Dead - Long Live the King
COMMENT: must be done before going to the Isle of Mists

NAME: The nobleman statuette
COMMENT: Bought from a merchant, before Triss is gone, so before "Now or Never" or before the Battle of Kaer Morhen if you romanced Triss

NAME: The Perks of Being a Jailbird
TRIGGER: Quest: Burlap is the New Stripe
COMMENT: Only available in story branch 1 when when doing Burlap is the New Stripe. Examine the loose stone on the wall at the start of Burlap is the New Stripe.

NAME: The Royal Air Force
COMMENT: North-east of Est Tayiar in ruins of castle

NAME: The Sad Tale of the Grossbart Brothers
The Secret Life of Count Romilly
The Soldier Statuette
COMMENT: Found during "A Dangerous Game", must be completed before "Now or Never" or before the Battle of Kaer Morhen if you romanced Triss

NAME: The Suffering of Young Francois
COMMENT: Questionmark in Fort Astre Ruins

NAME: The Taxman Cometh
COMMENT: North-west of Oxenfurt Harbor

NAME: The Things Men Do For Coin...
COMMENT: island east of the Border Post

NAME: The Toussaint Prison Experiment
COMMENT: Questionmark west of Fort Astre Ruins

NAME: The Truth is in the Stars
The Volunteer
COMMENT: Can't miss when you're there

NAME: The Warble of a Smitten Knight
COMMENT: Option to earn "There Can Only Be One" - After the horse race choose to accept the mounted duel against the prince and win it (Honor) - After following the girl into the woods and returning to camp, decide to finish the tourney and win (Valor) - Must be done before "Capture the Castle

NAME: The Whispering Hillock
COMMENT: If you don't trigger the quest first, you will be forced there while doing "ladies of the woods

NAME: The Witcher's Forge
COMMENT: Find a book behind stairs, near the kitchen. You need Eye of Nehaleni from Keira Metz to complete.

NAME: The Words of the Prophet Are Written on Sarcophagi
COMMENT: Loot the Bones of the Great Beggar's in the Temple near Prophet Lebioda Statue when being there for Quest: Scavenger Hunt: Grandmaster Manticore Gear

NAME: Thou Shalt Not Pass
COMMENT: Start it before completing "Fake Papers

NAME: Till Death Do You Part
COMMENT: When you have all gwent cards already you won't recieve them when you choose to help the female. Better to relocate her and choose the reward of the male (who will not give you cards even when he tells you he will)

NAME: Tinker, Hunter, Soldier, Spy
COMMENT: In tower east of Isolated Hut

NAME: To Bait a Forktail...
COMMENT: Tied in to Ugly Baby

NAME: Tough Luck
COMMENT: questionmark south east of Devil's Pit

NAME: Turn and Face The Strange
COMMENT: Exclamation mark near The Gran Palace. Option to earn "There Can Only Be One" - Give the child coin if you can! (Generosity)

NAME: Unlucky´s Treasure
COMMENT: questionmark on island where guy from the "Free Spirit"-quest lives

NAME: Vitner's Contract: Chuchote Cave
COMMENT: Questionmark west of Castel ravello vineyard

NAME: Vitner's Contract: Cleaning Those Hard-To-Reach Places
COMMENT: Questionmark north of Gelenser Farm

NAME: Vitner's Contract: Dun Tynne Hillside
COMMENT: Questionmark west of Dun Tynne Crossroads

NAME: Vitner's Contract: Griffin-in-the-Vines (Duchaton Crest)
COMMENT: Questionmark south-east of Rioux-Cannes outpost

NAME: Vitner's Contract: Rivecalme Storehouse
COMMENT: Questionmark west of Dulcinea Windmill

NAME: Waiting for Goe and Doh
COMMENT: Questionmark south-east of Casteldaccia abandonned estate

NAME: Wandering in the Dark
COMMENT: From Keira

NAME: Warehouse of Woe
COMMENT: West of Novigrad Docks

NAME: What Lies Unseen (branch 2)
COMMENT: Only available in story branch 2

NAME: What Was This About Again?
COMMENT: Questionmark in river north east of prophet lebioda statue

NAME: Where Children Toil, Toys Waste Away
Where the Cat and Wolf Play...
COMMENT: Initially listed as a witcher contract (The Beast of Honorton), then transforms into a side quest (Where the Cat and Wolf Play...)

NAME: Wine Wars: Belgaard (part 2)
COMMENT: Unlocks after Wine Wars: Consorting

NAME: Wine Wars: Consorting
TRIGGER: Quest: Wine Wars: The Dues in the Machina
COMMENT: After you completed Wine Wars - The Dues in the Machina go to the NPCs near Plegmund's Bridge

NAME: Wine Wars: Coronata
COMMENT: Do not finish this quest? Read notes you find during Coronata and Vermentino and do Wine Wars - The Dues in the Machina first!

NAME: Wine Wars: The Dues in the Machina
TRIGGER: Notes during quest Wine Wars: Vermentino and Wine Wars: Coronata
COMMENT: This unlockes if you read the notes during quests Wine Wars: Coronota and Wine Wars: Vermentino. Do not complete the other Wine Wars Quest before you completed this one!

NAME: Wine Wars: Vermentino
COMMENT: Do not finish this quest? Read notes you find during Coronata and Vermentino and do Wine Wars - The Dues in the Machina first!

NAME: Witcher Wannabe
COMMENT: Should appear somewhat late in game

NAME: Worthy of Trust
COMMENT: You can meet him twice near Kaer Trolde harbor, but go to Fyresdal to meet him the last time. The quest doesn't appear in your journal after first meeting with Skelliger an the docks

NAME: X Marks the Spot
COMMENT: South-east of Blandare
